title: Blendjet - V2 - Portable Blender - LAVANDER
description:
THE NEXT-GEN PORTABLE BLENDER

Looking to buy a BlendJet online and blend your way to a healthier lifestyle? Discover the incredible blending capabilities of BlendJet 2, designed for use anywhere, anytime. From your kitchen to the great outdoors, this portable blender is perfect for creating whatever you desire - whether it's at home, work, the gym, in the car, at the beach, or on vacation. Effortlessly blend on the go with ease and convenience.

Why Buy BlendJet V2 Online?

Patented TURBOJET Technology:
The stainless steel blades of BlendJet 2 are positioned away from the base's center, producing a tornado-like force that propels ingredients into the jar at a rate of 275 times per second, significantly improving blending. Alongside a stronger motor and double battery capacity, this technology makes BlendJet 2 five times more powerful than its predecessor, BlendJet One.

Orbiter Drinking Lid:

Introducing the Orbiter Drinking Lid, the perfect addition to your BlendJet V2. No longer worry about spilling your delicious smoothie while sipping on the go. With its leak-proof design and one-hand convenience, you can enjoy your drink anywhere, whether it's in the car, on a bike, or even while base jumping. Don't let spills ruin your day - Buy portable BlendJet online and take on any adventure!

Perfect for Everything:

The Blendjet V2 Portable Blender in Ocean allows you to make smoothie-bar-quality beverages, protein shakes, mixed drinks, frozen lattes, and a variety of other treats such as milkshakes, slushies, baby food, dips, dressings, and sauces.

Shake Up Your Routine

BlendJet V2 is more than just a blender - it is a lifestyle. This innovative device promotes healthier living and sustained energy levels with ease. Say goodbye to hectic breakfasts, spice up lunch, power through workouts, or relax with a frozen margarita, all while saving both time and money.

USB-C Rechargeable

The BlendJet 2 portable blender is designed to provide 15+ blends with just an hour of charging time. Its water-resistant USB-C port can be easily powered up with any USB port. Plus, the included cable is reversible, ensuring a hassle-free charging experience.

SELF-CLEANING

Say goodbye to the most annoying part of blending. Bulky kitchen blenders feel impossible to clean — especially when you’re in a hurry — but BlendJet 2 cleans itself. Just add a drop of soap, a bit of water, blend, and you’re ready for your next blended creation.

QUIET Enough for a Library
The BlendJet 2 portable blender is designed to provide powerful blending capabilities without the loud noise typically associated with kitchen blenders. Its quiet operation allows for use during late-night study sessions or early morning routines without disturbing others in the household.

Forget the Measuring Cup
Measurement markings on the jar make it easy to follow our mouth-watering recipes or to create your own with a 470 ml capacity.
Don't wait any longer! Buy Portable BlendJet online today and start blending your way to a healthier you!

description:
Escape your busy day-to-day tasks and treat your tired-self with the refreshing NESCAFÉ GOLD Toffee Nut Latte.

You are drinking the world's FAVORITE coffee brand, the highest quality coffee beans blended with skimmed milk powder and the luscious toffee nut flavor where the sweet buttery taste of toffee immerges with the warming nutty flavor to yield your beloved frothy coffee in your mug. How can you resist this heavenly mix? 

It's no surprise that 5,500 cups of NESCAFÉ coffee are drunk worldwide every SECOND!

This coffee is also suitable for you, vegetarians, as well.

8 Servings

Sugar, Skimmed Milk Powder (22%), Glucose Syrup, Coconut Oil, Coffee (6.2%) [Instant Coffee (5.7%), Roast and Ground Coffee], Lactose, Natural Flavouring, Acidity Regulators (Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid), Salt

title: Blendjet - V2 - Portable Blender - Ocean
description:
THE NEXT-GEN BLENDER

Discover the incredible blending capabilities of BlendJet 2, designed for use anywhere, anytime. From your kitchen to the great outdoors, this portable blender is perfect for creating whatever you desire - whether it's at home, work, the gym, in the car, at the beach, or on vacation. Effortlessly blend on the go with ease and convenience.

Features:
Patented TURBOJET Technology:
The stainless steel blades of BlendJet 2 are positioned away from the base's center, producing a tornado-like force that propels ingredients into the jar at a rate of 275 times per second, significantly improving blending. Alongside a stronger motor and double battery capacity, this technology makes BlendJet 2 five times more powerful than its predecessor, BlendJet One.

Orbiter Drinking Lid:

Introducing the Orbiter Drinking Lid, the perfect addition to your BlendJet V2. No longer worry about spilling your delicious smoothie while sipping on the go. With its leak-proof design and one-hand convenience, you can enjoy your drink anywhere, whether it's in the car, on a bike, or even while base jumping. Don't let spills ruin your day - be daring and take your BlendJet to any adventure!

Perfect for Everything:

The Blendjet V2 Portable Blender in Ocean allows you to make smoothie-bar-quality beverages, protein shakes, mixed drinks, frozen lattes, and a variety of other treats such as milkshakes, slushies, baby food, dips, dressings, and sauces.

Shake Up Your Routine

BlendJet V2 is more than just a blender - it is a lifestyle. This innovative device promotes healthier living and sustained energy levels with ease. Say goodbye to hectic breakfasts, spice up lunch, power through workouts, or relax with a frozen margarita, all while saving both time and money.

USB-C Rechargeable

The BlendJet 2 portable blender is designed to provide 15+ blends with just an hour of charging time. Its water-resistant USB-C port can be easily powered up with any USB port. Plus, the included cable is reversible, ensuring a hassle-free charging experience.

SELF-CLEANING

Say goodbye to the most annoying part of blending. Bulky kitchen blenders feel impossible to clean — especially when you’re in a hurry — but BlendJet 2 cleans itself. Just add a drop of soap, a bit of water, blend, and you’re ready for your next blended creation.

QUIET Enough for a Library
The BlendJet 2 portable blender is designed to provide powerful blending capabilities without the loud noise typically associated with kitchen blenders. Its quiet operation allows for use during late-night study sessions or early morning routines without disturbing others in the household.

Forget the Measuring Cup
Measurement markings on the jar make it easy to follow our mouth-watering recipes or to create your own with a 470 ml capacity.

title: Easyworkz Eclipse French Press Coffee Tea Maker with Borosilicate Glass - 350ml
description:
Product Description

The Easyworkz Eclipse French Press is an expertly crafted tool for coffee and tea enthusiasts who desire a pristine brewing experience. Made with high-quality borosilicate glass, this French Press is not only durable and resistant to thermal shock, but its transparency allows you to witness the brewing process in action. The 350ml capacity is perfect for personal use or sharing a fresh brew with a friend.

  • Borosilicate Glass Carafe: Known for its low expansion rate, high thermal resistance, and clarity, ensuring durability and clear visibility of the brewing process.
  • Stainless Steel Plunger and Frame: The sturdy plunger and frame are designed to withstand repeated use while maintaining the purity of flavor. Stainless steel does not interact with the coffee or tea, ensuring that the flavors are rich and unaltered.
  • Fine Mesh Filter: A precision filter mesh captures the coffee grounds or tea leaves effectively, allowing for a smooth, clean pour.
  • Durable Handle and Base: Ergonomically designed for easy pouring and handling, the handle and base are crafted to provide stability and style.
  • Lid: Fitted to maintain temperature and aroma during the brewing process while keeping external elements out.
tags: French Press

title: Upscale Large Coffee French Press Plunger - 600ml
description:
This French Press allows you to brew rich, flavorful coffee effortlessly, making it a centerpiece of your morning routine or a companion for your leisurely afternoons. Its 600ml capacity is ideal for serving small groups, ensuring that every guest enjoys a cup of freshly pressed coffee.

  • High-Quality Glass Carafe: The carafe is crafted from top-tier glass, offering durability and clarity, allowing you to watch your coffee bloom and brew.
  • Stainless Steel Plunger: The plunger is constructed from premium stainless steel, promising long-lasting use and resistance to rust or corrosion.
  • Fine Mesh Steel Filter: Integrated into the plunger, the fine mesh filter expertly strains grounds and sediments, delivering smooth, clear coffee without the grinds.
  • Sleek Metal Frame: Surrounding the glass carafe, the metal frame provides not only protection but also adds a touch of elegance with its minimalist design.
  • Heat-Resistant Handle: Designed for safety and comfort, the handle makes pouring hot coffee simple and safe, reducing the risk of burns.

title: Contigo - Streeterville Stainless Steel Travel Mug with Splash-Proof Lid, 14oz Vacuum-Insulated Coffee Mug with Handle & Grip Base to Prevent Slipping, Dishwasher Safe,  Dark Ice
description:
Made from robust stainless steel, it features a vacuum-insulated construction that keeps drinks hot for up to 5 hours or cold for up to 12 hours. The splash-proof lid and integrated handle with a grip base make it an ideal companion for busy mornings or rugged adventures. Its sleek "Dark Ice" finish not only looks stylish but also provides additional grip and reduces slipping.


  • Stainless Steel Body: Offers durability and maintains the temperature of hot or cold beverages effectively.
  • Vacuum Insulation: This technology prevents heat transfer from the interior to the exterior wall of the mug, keeping your drink at the ideal temperature for hours.
  • Splash-Proof Lid: Engineered to prevent spills and leaks, this lid makes it safe to carry your beverage, even when on the move.
  • Handle with Grip Base: The ergonomically designed handle provides a comfortable and secure grip, while the grip base helps to prevent the mug from slipping or tipping over.
  • Dishwasher Safe Materials: For ease of cleaning, the mug is dishwasher safe, making maintenance simple and quick.

title: Monin Flavouring Syrup - Sugar Free Hazelnut 250 ml
description:
Hazelnut, the nut of the hazel tree, have always complemeted chocolate. It's the main ingredient in your beloved Nutella spread jar. Imagine having the savour of Monin Hazelnut syrup in your coffee as your companion throughout the day. Itwill definitelymake your day.

MONIN Hazelnut Sugar Free is made with sucralose which is a no-calorie sweetener. Sucralose, being derived directly from sugar, offers a sweet sensation without the usual metallic aftertaste experienced with other sweeteners. It is proven to be perfectly safe for all (children, pregnant women, diabetics). Indulge yourself with the flavourful sensation of hazelnut.

Colour:Gold

Tasting notes:Fresh hazelnut nutty notes with a subtle of almonds and vanilla

title: Nespresso Vertuo Lattissima Delonghi Machine - White & Black
description:
Elevate your coffee experience with the Nespresso Vertuo Lattissima by De'Longhi, a sleek and sophisticated machine that brings café-quality coffee and espresso to your home.

Functions

  • Automatic Milk Frother: Integrated milk frother for creating creamy lattes and cappuccinos.
  • Centrifusion Technology: Patented extraction technology for optimal in-cup results.
  • One-Touch Brewing: Simple one-touch operation for brewing a variety of coffee and espresso drinks.
  • Versatile Brewing: Compatible with a wide range of Nespresso Vertuo capsules for diverse coffee options.
  • Fast Heat-Up: Heats up in just a few seconds, ensuring minimal wait time for your coffee.

Dimensions

  • Machine Dimensions: 19.2 cm (W) x 35.3 cm (D) x 25.8 cm (H)
  • Weight: 5.5 kg

Specifications

  • Color: White & Black
  • Water Tank Capacity: 1.3 liters
  • Milk Container Capacity: 0.5 liters
  • Used Capsule Container Capacity: 10 capsules
  • Power: 1400W
  • Pump Pressure: 19 bars
  • Cable Length: 85 cm
  • Material: Plastic and stainless steel

Facts

  • Centrifusion Extraction: The Nespresso Vertuo system uses barcode recognition technology to adjust brewing parameters for each capsule, ensuring perfect results.
  • Eco Mode: Energy-saving mode automatically activates after 9 minutes of inactivity.
  • Customizable Froth: Allows you to adjust the froth density to your preference for a perfect latte or cappuccino.
  • Sustainable Design: Nespresso is committed to sustainability, with options for recycling used capsules through their recycling program.

Selected hazelnuts and exquisite ingredients make our cream something very special. Made from whole, carefully roasted hazelnuts, it tastes unmistakably good thanks to its high nut content. Our Mövenpick hazelnut cream is free from palm oil and 100% natural, without the addition of dyes or preservatives. For our hazelnut cream, whole hazelnuts are carefully roasted and then gently processed with cocoa or milk into a delicate cream. As a result, they unfold their pleasant roasted aroma and taste unmistakably good. A spread for the whole family!

Weight

  • Net Weight: 300 grams

Ingredients

  • Sugar, roasted hazelnuts 20%, vegetable oils (rapeseed, sunflower, in variable weight proportions), low-fat cocoa powder 7%, skimmed milk powder, sweet whey powder, lactose, cocoa butter, emulsifier: lecithin (soya).
  • Allergens: Hazelnut, milk, whey milk, lactose, soya.
  • May also contains traces of: other tree nuts.

Nutrition Facts (per 100g serving)

  • Calories: 523 kcal
  • Total Fat: 29 g
    • Saturated Fat: 4.8 g
  • Sodium: 0.15 g
  • Total Carbohydrates: 57 g
    • Sugars: 55 g
  • Protein: 7 g
tags: Chocolate, Creams & Spreads, Movenpick, Nuts, Snacks & Treats

title: Lavazza - Ground Coffee - Gran Café Paulista - 250g
description:
Ground coffee Lavazza Gran Cafè Paulista - aromatic ground coffee, created according to the famous Italian recipe. This is Lavazza's first mono-sort of 100% Brazilian Arabica. Soft, sweet and rich espresso that can win the hearts of coffee lovers. Notes of chocolate and dried fruits give brightness and originality to the drink. The unique coffee beans are harvested from Rainforest Alliance certified plantations. Blend of medium roast. The optimal balance of bitterness and sweetness in taste allows you to drink a drink without sugar. Product symbol and icon original packaging design featuring brazilian real caballero with luxurious mustach

Taste Profile:
Chocolate and fruity notes.
